Observed at: Miramichi 1:00 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
